snippet.title: exA-Arcadia『東方電幻景』| Touhou Perfect Sakura Fantastica for Arcades | Attract Video | Vertical
snippet.description:
Touhou Perfect Sakura Fantastica for Arcades on exA-Arcadia
Available Now

Players: 1-2
Genre: Shooter
Monitor: Vertical (Recommended), Horizontal
Languages: English, Japanese

FEATURES

Touhou Perfect Sakura Fantastica brings the extremely popular Touhou series to arcades worldwide in a spectacular remake of Perfect Cherry Blossom (Touhou Episode 7 ). Join Reimu and Marisa for the first time in a full vertical screen experience complete with a fully voiced cast starring 12 famous anime voice actresses such as Ayaka Suwa, Naomi Ohzora, Hibiku Yamamura, Kanae Ito and more! Master musician Keishi Yonao’s newly composed arranged soundtrack reflects on the classic series’ tracks with a nostalgic yet fresh take that hypes up players to wade through the storm of enemy bullets. Featuring 4 playable characters and multiple difficulty levels in the original story, discover the mystery behind the long winter in the side story and epilogue modes. Optimized for 3x faster response times than the original game and equipped with information gadgets in both horizontal & vertical orientations, this is the ultimate Touhou experience supervised by the original series creators Team Shanghai Alice.


4 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
Choose from series veterans, Reimu and Marisa, along with fan favorites, Yomu and Sanae

2 Frame Input Lag Response - more than twice as fast as the original version 

3 PLAY MODES
ORIGINAL MODE - experience the original story with 4 different difficulty levels
EXTRA MODE
PHANTASM MODE

2 SOUNDTRACKS
ORIGINAL - the original game soundtrack 
ARRANGED - the new arranged soundtrack composed by Keishi Yonao

NEW VOICES
Every character is fully voiced by renowned anime voice actors!

CAST
REIMU - AYAKA SUWA
MARISA - NAOMI OHZORA
YOMU - HIBIKU YAMAMURA
SANAE -  KANAE ITO
and more

LEARN MORE ➡️ https://bit.ly/43aBhNY
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用
縦スクロールシューティング
『東方電幻景』
絶賛稼働中

詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/42bnDZm
チャンネル登録 ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


About exA-Arcadia:
exA-Arcadia is the worldwide leading manufacturer of arcade joystick video games with over 30 high quality titles available now covering popular genres such as fighters, beat'em ups, action and shooters. 

NEVER SETTLE
DEMAND THE BEST
POWER TO THE EXA
